remarks: Generalize a specific 2-element group ` L ` to show that any set ` K ` with the same (relevant) properties is also a group.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
statement:
grppropstr.b $e |- ( Base ` K ) = B $.
grppropstr.p $e |- ( +g ` K ) = .+ $.
grppropstr.l $e |- L = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. } $.
grppropstr $p |- ( K e. Grp <-> L e. Grp ) $.
